name: In This Together: The Game
description:
Move your finger up and down, and left and right, to move both characters on the screen.
One follows your finger, the other does the opposite. Both must dodge as many obstacles as possible.

The theme behind this game is that in a relationship, you must look out not only for yourself, but for your partner as well. This game mirrors the idea that whatever you do effects someone else as well. So be considerate, show love, and protect your partner, always.

You know the vibes tho, have fun!

(P.S. clippers gon clip)
